snippet.title: Clouzy! Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore the world alongside your flying pet, collect delicious fruits, and cook tasty meals to look after your cloud daycare in this cute and wholesome farming game. Coming to Xbox and Steam on May 2021.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Find out more about Clouzy! here!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1493360/Clouzy/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TinymoonTeam
Web: https://tinymoon.es
Wiki: https://forums.tinymoon.es
Presskit: https://tinymoon.es/press/sheet.php?p=clouzy!
Discord: https://discord.gg/rqgB7z9

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#steam #xbox #clouzy
